html.p: The project has a single mailing list, which can be used for sending bug reports, patches, suggestions, questions, etc.
The mailing list is also available as newsgroups (which can be read with a newsreader such as Pan):

div.h3: If clicking on the link above directly doesn't work

ol.li: Load Pan and add news.gmane.org as a new server (Tools->News Servers).
Select gmane using the Server menu.
Type zero-install into the group search box (top left) and press Return to find the group.

You can right click over the group and choose Subscribe from the menu to make it easier to find them in future. Note that 'Subscribing' to a news group just marks it as interesting to your newsreader. It is completely different to subscribing to a mailing list.

html.p: Bugs can also be filed on the bug tracker. However, it's best to post non-trivial bugs to the mailing list too, as more people will see them there.
